website_summaries.verdict: A solid and sturdily built rocking chair that is suitable for outdoor use. Crafted from sturdy, weather-resistant materials.
pros: Built from durable POLYWOOD, which is not prone to splintering or cracking
Marine-grade hardware is built to last and sturdy
We love that the UV protective material and coloring means no repainting or staining over time
cons: Some users say the pre-drilled holes aren't positioned correctly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. Such high quality. I had chairs in my cart for less than half the price of these (about 100 bucks) but I just couldn't pull the trigger to "complete purchase." Something just didn't feel right, even though the price was great. But I am SO glad I sprung for the more expensive chairs. They are so worth it! The vintage lantern color is a deep brown. I can tell these are going to last a long time. Assembly was easy--I am a 56 year old woman and was able to put them together by myself!
customer_reviews.author: Patty D.

customer_reviews.title: They are moderately comfortable (back is a bit rigid) and rock well
customer_reviews.text: Received one of two rockers. Arrived well-packed. Assembly was straight-forward, though you may need to loosen side assembly to get rocking feet on (took me a few minutes to figure out, as the holes don’t line up). Chairs are constructed well and they provide stainless screws, so it should outlast me. They are moderately comfortable (back is a bit rigid) and rock well. I will purchase cushion to soften. In photo, they appear shiny, which is not the case. Typical of composite, it’s dull, but uniform and sturdy. Overall, very nice and you’re paying for the luxury of leaving outside year after year after year, without rot, damage, decay or loss of function.
customer_reviews.author: JGST

customer_reviews.title: bring a hammer
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. Had the same problem with both so it must be a manufacturing problem. The seat sections would not fit easily into the side sections. Could not get the seat rails and the mounting sockets to easily line up. Required a rubber hammer and a couple of ratchet straps to persuade and wrestle things into place. Great products once they are assembled.
customer_reviews.author: frogbuster

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the sturdiness of the chair however it sits too straight back for me! its great for outdoor weather and will never rot!, but for comfort? It needs to have a slight lean backward for more added comfort. Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful American Quality Rocker!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled it in about 20 mins. Very easy and fit together well. My wife is thrilled. Just ordered another. Back-ordered 2 months because it is in high demand. No wonder why. I don't mind waiting for a quality product. It should outlast me! Great design, comfortable, durable, made in USA!
customer_reviews.author: ejestin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my front porch which is a Trex deck. They definitely look expensive and are quite impressive. As far as putting them together, they are not real easy but they are so worth it.As far as the comfort level, I ordered two lumbar pillows and they made it exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Clean bum

customer_reviews.title: Don’t seriously look at assembly time. Trex material will deliver even with added 45 min. assembly .
customer_reviews.text: Seat assembly time to insert rocker panels would have extremely shortened if punch outs for inserts to connect would have been properly machined in the first place without me using a utility knife to widen for easier completion of this quality product. It was time consuming and frustrating. Don’t give a time assembly till you correct this factory faux pas !!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Great Rockers
customer_reviews.text: I put 2 together by myself. An extra pair of hands would have made easier but not necessary. Gave 4 stars because rockers seem a little short. Yes the back is STRAIGHT but I don't expect porch rockers to feel like a Lazy Boy.
customer_reviews.author: Buffhotwing

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive - could be more comfortable for back
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair -- it has made it through 4 seasons outdoors (no cover) and still looks great. Only issue I have is the back support is VERY straight and I need to put a lumbar pillow at the bottom of my spine to really be comfortable. But I"m glad we bought it... so nice on the front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E Diffily

customer_reviews.title: Chairs delivered
customer_reviews.text: We received the chairs without problem. I wish I could say the same about assembling them. My husband builds furniture as a hobby, and even he had trouble with two of them. He got out his own tools, had to drill some holes (not that easy with trex), and took much more time than anticipated. The color is very nice, just what we expected. Now that they are together, we like them very well.
customer_reviews.author: birchtree

customer_reviews.title: Great rockers!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great, very high quality. They feel very solid, and the trex material (just like our deck) will hopefully wear much better. Yes they are pricey, but after going through two sets of less expensive chairs in the last few years, its worth spending the money. They were easy to put together, the provided allen wrench actually was more useful than my allen socket set.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Pre drilled holes are improperly drilled
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was difficult due to improperly pre drilled holes. Something that should have been quick and simple to put together became very aggravating very quickly. Not a very wide seat and not quite as comfortable as a typical wooden rocker. Expected more for this kind of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Friday

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs. Pathetic shipping time.
customer_reviews.text: We love these rocking chairs and in fact had ordered 2 more to match the first ones we bought. The problem is they took over 2 months to ship to us. We got emails over and over “do you still want these?” Over and over they said the chairs were on the way. Over and over they weren’t. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: Just received two rockers three days ago. My husband and I assembled both within 90 minutes (we are seniors). They are very attractive and sturdy. I have no doubt regarding their longevity. We lugged our old rockers to the basement every fall (we live in PA). These will be a permanent fixture on our covered front porch. No more lugging! In my opinion, they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie M Eichenberger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy porch rockers
customer_reviews.text: As much as I like wood sometimes you need a weatherproof material. These chairs are reasonably easy to put together and high quality. We use our lanai much more now that we have these. They are very inviting and we don’t have to worry about them getting wet. They are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size easy to assemble I’m 50 not in great physical health and I easily assembled this alone. Also I’m using this in place of living room furniture
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Rocker
customer_reviews.text: We stayed in a vacay rental that had these and ordered them for our patio. They are comfortable, easy to assemble, and great quality that will last. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Talisgeir

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and sturdiness. BUT EXTREMELY UNCOMFORTABLE AND LOUSY ROCK. I ordered 2 and assembled the first and destroyed the box. Returning the 2nd one which we had not unpacked. If you want it for looks only it is a great chair. But certainly not a comfortable rocker!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Construction, but Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: The chair is well made but the seating position is very stiff and awkward. The back of the chair is perfectly flat and quite uncomfortable; a curved back might help make this a better product. I expected something more comfortable at this price point. They make nice decorations for my front porch, but I don't sit in them that often.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Durable product. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great product... I'm confident it will last a very long time. It was easy to assemble and probably took me about 20 minutes. The key is to not fully tighten the screws until all the screw are in place. then tighten them all. This allows for wiggling the parts to make the holes align.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Old mans favorite .
customer_reviews.text: Just a wonderful piece of furniture. I put it on my front porch.I spend at least a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brains

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Really great additions to our deck and front porch. We bought 4 and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love the rocker...bought one a couple years ago and it still looks like new. Decided it needed a partner, same color, looks great. My husband and I put it together without yelling at each other! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MaureenO

customer_reviews.title: Great Rocking Chair
customer_reviews.text: Great rocker. A couple of parts were missing but shipping to me promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Playgolfnj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rockers
customer_reviews.text: The rockers were a little time consuming to put together, however they are very comfortable and seem to be very strong.
customer_reviews.author: mariesub

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing Defect
customer_reviews.text: The chair is designed with strong mortise and tenon joints attaching the seat and back to the side posts. Unfortunately, the front seat mortise was cut into the wrong side of both side posts. I have contacted Trex, and am trying to resolve this as a warranty issue. If that fails I will just return the chair to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seat of the chair too low
customer_reviews.text: this rocker would be nice if it was not so low to the ground. I have bad knees and cannot sit in the chair without discomfort. Regret this purchase ( 2 chairs + the table)!
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi8836

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with these chairs. I bought two and assembled them both myself. Just took a little time and patience. Couldn’t be more pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PastorD.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Loved the chair and the color and durability, however the assembly process wasn't as easy as expected. The screw holes from some of the pieces did not line up during the assembly process so had to basically create new holes in the bottom base.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am sitting on this chair as I review it. Great build quality, a handsome green color, and very comfortable. The seat area is a tad shallow, but it hasn’t prevented me from enjoying many comfortable evenings in he chair.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality chair
customer_reviews.text: It is a high quality, sturdy and good looking chair. I managed to assemble alone but instructions say a buddy is recommended, and they are right! Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: M. Milgram

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: A great product. Would have given 5 stars except not all pieces fit easily. Fortunately my husband is very handy and was able to put together with use of additional tools. The chair is comfortable and looks great on our deck. Glad we bought 2 !!
customer_reviews.author: trouble54

customer_reviews.title: These are sturdy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: We live in a windy area so we are grateful these are heavy enough not to blow around on our deck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these rockers! Very sturdy and the material really feels like wood but clearly will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Giles King

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but uncomfortable.  Needs better design
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality chair. Should last a long time. However it is too short and not comfortable. The back is straight and not curved. Teak chairs I bought from Sam's club were much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: petdoc

customer_reviews.title: Love the chair
customer_reviews.text: The tool provided for assembly would have taken forever to put chair together. With an electric screwdriver and a couple of people it went together somewhat easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my porch very comfy. My porch isn’t covered other chairs I had didn’t last. I’m hoping this one does last.
customer_reviews.author: nancy pickens

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor rocking chair
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about TREX? Easy to assemble and this will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie A.

customer_reviews.title: Classy addition to my farmhouse-style front porch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rocking chair and the yacht club table for the front porch of my farmhouse-style home. Makes a great place to sit and enjoy my coffee while I look out over my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great chairs
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute on my porch. i bought two. They are heavy duty, weather resistant, and super cute. My husband and I had them together in minutes. :)
customer_reviews.author: smot73

customer_reviews.title: Super product - well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This a great product. Very well packaged. Easy to assemble (as long as you follow the instructions closely). It looks and feels every bit of the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Igielinski

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: an excellent product for a patio exposed to the elements. We find it comfortable to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: JR Schu

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting OUTDOOR furniture
customer_reviews.text: These are pricy but amazing. Perfect if you have no winter storage. Sit out all winter in PA and look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Clue

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and maintenance free
customer_reviews.text: Love this poly rocker. It's very comfortable and basically maintenance free. Worth the premium price.
customer_reviews.author: Smartinup

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and yet comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We're enjoying sitting on the back porch watching the river flow.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT.
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I didn't pay the 80 dollars for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Good

customer_reviews.title: Perfect porch rockers
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Outdoor front porch. Quality, comfort and durability. No disappointment here!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no quality control
customer_reviews.text: chair does not assemble easily because holes are not aligned. Cannot get parts must send the entire chair back. Not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie miller

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: The chair came well packaged. The instructions were complete and assembly was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: David H Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Faux Rockers are Best
customer_reviews.text: These are great chairs! Easy to clean and will sever rot or splinter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover 470

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid, easy to assemble and comfortable. It feels like sitting on teak without the upkeep. Hand slot is a nice thought. Nice way to end a summer day.
customer_reviews.author: luadhas

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Comfortable for High Price
customer_reviews.text: Rocker looks good but is not comfortable without cushions. Then if you add a back cushion it moves you too much forward so that the seat depth is not adequate to support thighs. Also, seat is low which I suppose is good for children but an adult would be more comfortable with a higher seat. For a chair priced this high it should be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent R

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as I would like
customer_reviews.text: Product went together very easily and is constructed very well. I was a little disappointed that the back was a little too straight and not at the proper angle for complete comfort, but by adding some pillows, it worked out ok.
customer_reviews.author: JANE CUCINELLI

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Was really impressed with the quality of materials and ease of assembly. Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gisewhite Jr.

customer_reviews.title: and they were easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very well made, and they were easy to assemble. I love the styling of the rockers. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hecker

customer_reviews.title: We love the chairs
customer_reviews.text: We love the chairs! The only possible regret is that the pads don't go up the back. Hopefully they will last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Kate L. Bartz

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, COMFORTABLE but one came damaged/not aligned
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the rockers and easy to build overall. I ordered two. One came and was damaged/didn't line up properly for the screws at the bottom of the rocker but assumed it was just how it was until I put together the second with ease. Wasn't worth taking the first one apart and trying to send it back for a replacement but hoping it still lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy_J

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, easy to assemble. Very comfortable and maintenance free for my outdoor front porch.
customer_reviews.author: William Lisnerski

customer_reviews.title: Trex Rocker
customer_reviews.text: Love the style. Need to add a seat cushion though to make it comfortable. Will hold up in any weather and still look good.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: rocker chair trex
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble - no maintence required - just wash the dust off when needed - love the chair i bought 2 of them
customer_reviews.author: james b.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect rocking chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. I was looking for an all weather rocking chair for my front porch. I couldn't be happier with my choice. The assembly was very easy. They are so comfortable and very pretty. Would definitely recommend to anyone !
customer_reviews.author: diana ridolfi

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: quality rockers. easy to assemble. i expect them to last a long time, based on the material used. great fit for porch.
customer_reviews.author: nancy sica

customer_reviews.title: work
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot of work to put together... I had to get someone to construct for me.... a week after I received them they went on sale for an additional $100.ea off I bought 2 chairs, a table and a bench.. so it added up.... as far as the material they are really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M.Rice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match!
customer_reviews.text: Great all weather rocker. Got it to match the Trex vintage lantern trim on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great rocker!
customer_reviews.text: Great porch rocker, very comfortable. Nice design. I like this product a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Service Not So Much
customer_reviews.text: Rocking chair quality was good as advertised. However, missing one of hex screws for chair assembly. Called service center for chair manufacturer and was told no problem, they would send a replacement hex screw right away. Over a week plus later and still waiting. Eventually went to hardware store myself and found a suitable replacement screw to complete the chair assembly. Not that hard to do, but expected better service to go with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dean H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Trex Yacht Club rocker
customer_reviews.text: Bought one liked it so much ordered a second. Very well made product. Also have the 18 in Trex side table.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Lomoriello

customer_reviews.title: no HARDWARE
customer_reviews.text: One of the 2 chairs I ordered came with ZERO HARDWARE. And I have no idea who to call, as it was SHIPPED by amazon. ANNOYINGGGGG.
customer_reviews.author: V. Albright

product_meta.title: Trex Outdoor Furniture Yacht Club Rocker Chair, Charcoal Black
product_meta.description: Color:Charcoal BlackOutdoor living just got a lot more comfortable. The leader in all things outdoor now offers the ultimate in relaxation: stylish, comfortable, durable outdoor furniture. Trex Outdoor Furniture is made from high-performance, recycled milk jug lumber- soft to the touch, but tough against the most extreme weather, including sun, rain, saltwater and snow. And it's incredibly low-maintenance, so you can spend your time relaxing on our furniture, not refinishing it. With the distinctive styling and curves Trex is known for, the hard part will be deciding which pieces to choose. The Trex Yacht Club collection provides a versatile lounging and dining experience. This collection features a three-position high-back chair that folds flat for easy storage as well as an adjustable-back chaise. Available in our seven traditional colors, The Yacht Club Collection offers dining tables in varying lengths and widths that withstand challenging marine environments. Trex Outdoor Furniture's HDPE solid lumber construction gives this collection the ability to endure harsh weather conditions for generations without warping, rotting, cracking or splintering. The new Yacht Club Rocking Chair by Trex Outdoor Furniture offers a comfortable, stylish look and feel that is perfect for your outdoor setting. With its contoured seat and arms this chair will be a perfect fit for your front porch, patio or deck.
feature_bullets: Trex furniture uses genuine stainless steel hardware for optimal performance and longevity

Trex outdoor furniture requires minimal assembly; some models even unfold right out of the box with no need for assembly; items that require assembly often take less than 30 minutes to complete and include basic tools with easy to follow instructions
Trex Outdoor Furniture does not need to be stained, painted or sealed in any way due to the durable nature of the material
Overall dimensions: 26-1/2-inch w by 33-3/4-inch d by 42-1/2-inch h;
Items that require assembly often take less than 30 minutes to complete and include basic tools with easy to follow instructions; made in USA
Some models even unfold right out of the box with no need for assembly; stainless steel hardware for optimal performance and longevity
Furniture does not need to be stained, painted or sealed in any way due to the durable nature of the material; charcoal black color
Measures 26-1/2-inches width by 33-3/4-inches depth by 42-1/2-inches height

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
